name: specstory-autosave
displayName: SpecStory AutoSave + AI Copilot Prompt Detection
description: Auto-exports GitHub Copilot Chat to SpecStory documentation + instant AI prompt detection with quality verification notifications

specstoryautosave.autoSaveInterval.description: Auto-save interval in minutes for Copilot chat exports (1-60 minutes)

specstoryautosave.enableAutoSave.description: Enable automatic saving of chat history at regular intervals

specstoryautosave.enableAICheckNotificat.description: Show red notifications to check AI results after each prompt

specstoryautosave.enableAutoConfirmDialo.description: Automatically confirm SpecStory export dialog instead of requiring manual confirmation

specstoryautosave.aiNotificationMessage.default:
AI prompt detected! Please check:
• Did AI understand your question correctly?
• If working with HTML, inspect for invisible elements
• Verify the response quality and accuracy
specstoryautosave.aiNotificationMessage.description: Custom message to display in AI activity notifications

specstoryautosave.enableSmartNotificatio.description: Enable smart notifications based on SpecStory conversation analysis (uses context-aware messages)

specstoryautosave.specstoryHistoryPath.description: Path to SpecStory history folder (e.g., C:\Proj_Net\portal-ui\.specstory\history\). Leave empty for auto-detection.

specstoryautosave.aiNotificationFrequenc.description: Show AI notification every Nth prompt (1 = every prompt, 2 = every 2nd prompt, etc.)

specstoryautosave.detectionLevel.description: AI detection level: off (disabled), basic (command hooks only), advanced (+ panels/patterns), aggressive (+ code/memory detection)
enumDescriptions: No AI detection - extension will not monitor for AI activity
Basic detection - monitors VS Code commands only (recommended)
Advanced detection - adds panel focus and content pattern detection
Aggressive detection - includes code insertion and memory monitoring

specstoryautosave.enableCommandHookDetec.description: Enable detection via VS Code command interception (recommended for testing)

specstoryautosave.enableWebviewDetection.description: Enable detection when Copilot Chat webview panels become active (recommended)

specstoryautosave.enablePanelFocusDetect.description: Enable detection based on chat panel focus changes

specstoryautosave.enablePatternDetection.description: Enable detection by scanning document content for AI patterns

specstoryautosave.enableCodeInsertionDet.description: Enable detection of AI activity based on large code insertions (fallback method)

specstoryautosave.enableMemoryDetection.description: Enable detection based on memory usage spikes (experimental)

specstoryautosave.enableTerminalDetectio.description: Enable detection based on terminal activity and command execution (experimental - may cause false positives)

specstoryautosave.enableFileSystemDetect.description: Enable detection based on rapid file changes and creation patterns (experimental - may cause false positives)

specstoryautosave.enableKeyboardActivity.description: Enable detection based on rapid typing patterns typical for AI code generation (experimental - may cause false positives)

specstoryautosave.showOnlyCopilotLogs.description: Show only Copilot/AI related logs in the output channel (filters out other extension logs)

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
